title: Ep - 144 - DEBRA NEWELL FROM DIRTY JOHN
description:
Debra Newell discusses with the help of renowned criminal behavior analyst Laura Richards her relationship with John Meehan, which became the subject of the hit podcast “Dirty John” as well as the inspiration for the Bravo series of the same name. After meeting Meehan on an online dating site they quickly married only to find out Meehan, who masqueraded as a successful doctor was a grifter with a long history of stalking, harassment, drug abuse, and time in prison. Debra and Laura discuss signs of coercive control, the impact of psychological terrorism, and give advice to victims suffering in silence.


Writer, theater director and Kate’s elementary school classmate Michael Kimmel reviews the season premiere of Lindsay Lohan’s Beach Club on MTV.


Father of six Steve Tate reviews the season premiere of The Bachelor on ABC. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey
